entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 02:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: WSW 31 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
